summary.para: This class represents the main entry of a Publisher Pipeline Configuration within the GlobalLink Publisher application.
It is an object representation of a configuration script to be executed by the Publisher Agent.
It consists of a basic definition one or more stages, that consist of one or more jobs, each containing one or more Job steps to execute by the agent.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.ConfigurationId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique configuration identifier.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name/title of the configuration.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description details of the configuration.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.BuildNumberFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the output build and revision number template string.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.StatusBadgesEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status badges of the server are enabled for this configuration.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Demands
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of demands necessary for the configuration to execute.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.CancelTimeoutInMinutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout in minutes that the agent run will wait before cancelling the job.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the pipeline content source configuration. This is where the configuration source content will be received.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Variables
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of optional pipeline configuration variables used within the job steps of the configuration.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Jobs
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of jobs for the agent to process and execute through. Jobs are an organizational concept within the configuration to process a list of tasks within a single context.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Triggers
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of optional trigger configurations that will automate the execution of this configuration.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Revisions
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of revision audit records noting recent changes to this configuration.

member.name: M:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Configuration.Schema
member.summary: This method is used to generate the JSON schema object dynamically for the configuration models.
member.returns: Returns a new object for the Configuration model.

member.name: T:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Demand
member.summary: This class represents a demand to be included in the publisher pipeline configuration.
member.remarks: Demands are specific tag requirements of a build image/runner needed for the particular publisher pipeline configuration to be executed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the demand name.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Demand.Operand
member.summary: Gets or sets the demand operand.

member.name: P:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Pipeline.Schema.Demand.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the demand value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the description.

member.name: T:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities
member.summary: This class contains static feature ability keys used for feature security claims assignment.
member.remarks:
Users will always be able to read their own request runs. Otherwise, specific feature abilities must be specified. Additional abilities are related to organizational request runs.
The concept of "manage" is a combination of create/update a record. We try to keep things as simple as possible within Publisher to read and/or manage records. In some cases delete will be included, in others it may not.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.RequestUserManage
member.summary: Feature ability for user to manage their own request runs.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.RequestUserDelete
member.summary: Feature ability for user to delete their own request run records.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.RequestTenantRead
member.summary: Feature ability for user to read all tenant request run records. Organization level read.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.RequestTenantManage
member.summary: Feature ability for user to manage all tenant request run records.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.RequestTenantDelete
member.summary: Feature ability for user to delete all tenant request run records.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.PipelineTenantRead
member.summary: Feature ability for user to be able to view/read pipeline configurations in detail.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.PipelineTenantManage
member.summary: Feature ability for user to be able to create, update, and delete pipeline configurations.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.ReportsUserRead
member.summary: Feature ability for user to be able read their own analytic reports.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.ReportsTenantRead
member.summary: Feature ability for user to be able read tenant analytic reports.

member.name: F:Vasont.Publisher.Models.Security.FeatureAbilities.AdminTenantManage
member.summary: Feature ability for users to be able to administrate a tenant settings and security configuration.

member.summary: Feature ability covers all abilities.
